pitch.cc: Josh Judy may prefer to go after Don Kelly, whose OPS is .605 this season, with the slider rather than facing Ramon Santiago, whose OPS is .678.
Josh Judy is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.
Josh Judy is trying to tie up Don Kelly with fastballs inside; Kelly is hitting .263 on pitches in that location compared to .226 overall.
